body: i think she can still save him but the after effect will be disastrous maybe if she goes into non incest mode (idk because i can't read the words so idk if she ever tried maybe repeating everything and saving him in crucial moment)

what a fucking nightmare , she staying in a loop of 3 days which they first do it in 3/7 and her brother dead in 5/7 , the dead is an unavoidable must , so as she love him verymuch she staying forever and ever

@AshoMako this is correct. @Tossiap I’ll try my best in translating the last page. Forewarning my Japanese translation abilities are amateur at best: [Bro]: “Hey…we haven’t gone to school together in a while huh? We have class in the morning so it would feel like a date when we’re going back home” I don’t know how to translate this nuance in English but basically because they have class they have to pretend to be normal siblings to keep up appearances but when no one’s watching they can do couple activities. [Girl]: “I agree” [Bro]: Well…_I’m off. [Girl Monologue]:  Probably he’s already going to…[die again][Girl]: “No, Bye-Bye this turn’s Onii-chan.”
But after seeing this (Can't read only looking at the drawings) i rly am curious of what she and he is saying when all that crazy stuff happened.

I know it usually take months/years for a translator (Theres probably translators that translate their favourite hentai days after their release) or Nhentai only post translates that a specific translator translated or giving us the best translated version of the hentai.
Kinda depressing end but I guess there's no way around it

Stein Gate plot but in hentai mode to be short. The dude is killed when trying to save her and then she turned back time. But no matter what the brother gonna die within a week and she get used to it.  I guess she's beyond broken when she said  goodbye to her brother in this loop already
